text: God grant, however, that I may be a false prophet & that all may go well. Sir R. Peel as here, I understand, but an express took him off yesterday.' While he was in Naples there had opened a new chapter in the history of Anglesey's. unceasing search for an effective alleviation of his painful malady. None of the numerous conventional remedies to which he had been subjected ever since the symptoms had first shown themselves seventeen years before had had the slightest effect.
